greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence of nonnegative integers, but insert n/2 after every even number n.
comment: Coefficients in expansion of e/3 = Sum_{n>=1} a(n)/n!, using greedy algorithm.
Numerators of Peirce sequence of order 2.
reference: R. L. Graham, D. E. Knuth and O. Patashnik, Concrete Mathematics, Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 2nd ed. 1998, p. 151.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,2,0,0,-1).
maple: A009947 := proc(a,n) local i,b,c; b := a; c := [ floor(b) ]; for i from 1 to n-1 do b := b-c[ i ]/i!; c := [ op(c), floor(b*(i+1)!) ]; od; c; end:
program: (PARI) a(n)=if(n%3==1, n\3, n\3*2+!!(n%3)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 02 2015
results.author: _Bill Gosper_
